summary: This mod aims to retexture (recolor) all obtainable armor from the Dragonborn DLC.
descriptionHtml:
This mod aims to retexture (recolor) all obtainable armor from the Dragonborn DLC. At the moment, Chitin - Light, Cultist Robes, and Stalhrim - Heavy are complete. Color comparison to the screenshots provided will depend on your ENB/lighting mod. Some mods make everything look lighter.

I tend to use a lot of brown and black, so if you would like to see something else go ahead and make a request. No guarantees, but I will try to fulfill it.

---------

Mod currently contains retextures for the following: Bonemold, Chitin Light + Heavy, Stalhrim Light + Heavy, Nordic Carved, Temple Priest Outfit, and Telvanni Robes.

Current Version: 1.4

*Updates*

- All files moved into manual install format. See readme for install instructions.

- New screenshots added.

- Added Stalhrim - Black Ice

- Added Temple Priest Outfit - Red

- Added Telvanni Robes

- Fixed Stalhrim Light - Black and White chest for males
author: Auddi
